description:
The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Make your games more legitimate with Scoreboard!

Scoreboard lets you keep score on the go with a real scoreboard. Scoreboard is great for those looking to referee a game, keep track of scoring for a game that they are watching, or legitimize the competetive nature of a game that they are playing by using a real legitimate scoreboard on their phone, tablet or other device!

The Scoreboard app is applicable to any points-based game like, football, basketball, baseball, soccer and many more (including board games and other indoor/outdoor games).

You can even: 
-change point / score increments 
-set team colors
-set team names
-set win limits
-set a game timer (counting up or down)
-accurately manage and keep track of game time
-edit points on the fly
+ more!

Just tap the side that scored to increase their score on the scoreboard! Reset the score to start a new game.

Make your games more legitimate with Scoreboard!

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Tired of losing track of your game’s score? This app is designed to simply keep track of the score, whether there are two teams or numerous!

Scoreboard tracker allows you to:
- Track the score of your game
- Pick the length of time
- Choose different team or player names
- Adjust team’s starting points
- Change the theme color
- Determine how many points to win the game

Scoreboard Tracker can be used for all sports and activities. For example:
Football, soccer, volleyball, pickleball, tennis, baseball, ping pong, hockey, corn hole, chess, cricket, ultimate frisbee, board games and much more!

To access all features, content, and functionality you can subscribe to an annual auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. 

Privacy Policy: https://appcano.io/privacy
Terms of Use: https://appcano.io/terms

developer: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

Watch Football TV live or on-demand across multiple devices so you can tune in at home or on the go. 

Football TV Live app includes livestream, soccer highlights, daily sport news, match previews & predictions. 
You can watch all football matches of all country leagues, Europe, UK, USA Sport, Europa League, Champions League, Asian Sport and much more on your mobile device.

WATCH FOOTBALL THE WAY YOU LOVE IT

• Everything streams at the best quality your device can handle, up to HD
• Football includes all main leagues live
• Sports online on your mobile and tablet. Anytime. Anywhere.

Privacy Policy Consent
By installing this app you agree to the privacy policy

We're excited to introduce a whole new level of cricket engagement with our latest update. Dive into the fresh features that await:

Sleek New Design: Embrace the excitement of cricket with our revamped interface! The app now sports a cleaner, more user-friendly design, making your experience smoother and more enjoyable. Navigate effortlessly to find what you love faster.

Faster Performance: Speed matters, both on the field and in your app experience. We've turbocharged the performance of the ICC app, ensuring quicker load times, smoother transitions, and a more responsive interface. Never miss a beat of the action!

Video Hub: Your one-stop destination for all things cricket! Access a comprehensive collection of LIVE International cricket on ICC.tv, in selected territories. Plus, thrilling match highlights, exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes footage from ICC events, to immerse yourself in the world of cricket like never before.

The RugbyPass app is the home of rugby. Offering fans a one-stop solution to enjoy the game they love, how they want it.

- Watch live rugby games from around the world from the sport’s premier competitions including SVNS, u20’s Championships and Pacific Nations Cup and so much more.
- Keep up to date with the latest Rugby news covering all the leagues around the world in unrivaled detail.
- The game has never been easier to deep dive into with the biggest rugby database showing live scores, stats and player profiles.
- The #1 destination for fans to watch everything from classic Rugby World Cup matches to exclusive shows and documentaries including unseen interviews and analysis from rugby’s biggest stars.

Join the global rugby community and never miss a moment!

Terms and Conditions - http://info.rugbypass.tv/terms-and-conditions/ 
Privacy Policy - http://info.rugbypass.tv/privacy/ 
EULA - https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Introducing Scoreboard: the simple yet awesome companion for keeping score. It does exactly what you'd expect - tracks the score - but it offers so much more!

Take your scorekeeping to the next level with Scoreboard, the ultimate app for tracking scores and managing games. Whether you're playing sports, board games, or organizing a tournament, Scoreboard has you covered. It's time to elevate your scorekeeping experience and leave pen and paper behind!

What can Scoreboard do for you?
* Keep score effortlessly!
* Assign player names.
* Add player profile images.
* Customize point increments.
* Choose a theme color for your game.
* Set the winning point goal.
* Adjust font style and size.
* Increase points with a tap or swipe up, decrease with a swipe down.
* Automatic game saving.
* Supports dark mode.

Scoreboard is perfect for a wide range of sports and games: 
Basketball, Soccer, Handball, Football, Tennis, Table Tennis, Hockey, Volleyball, Boxing, Judo, Wrestling,  Badminton, Lacrosse, Cornhole, Baseball, Bowling, Board Games, MMA, Skiing, Cricket, Golf, Ping Pong

And guess what? I try to limit ads that will interrupt your game. I know how annoying they can be, so I've got your back! Enjoy uninterrupted scorekeeping with Scoreboard!

Unlock the full potential of Scoreboard and dive into a world of premium features with our exclusive auto-renewing yearly subscription plan priced at just $6.99 USD/year.  Elevate your scorekeeping experience

For more information about how we handle your data and ensure your privacy, please review our Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Job3EQpVdnOLdgYssAn-6GWYbheWIO5ftKh0CQzuve8/edit. By using Scoreboard, you agree to our Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/.

Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Privacy policy: https://fishingpoints.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://fishingpoints.app/terms

Enjoy Live TV Anywhere with the DigicelTV App!

Catch all the action in sports, local and international news, entertainment, and more—live! The DigicelTV App offers instant access to top TV channels and events, giving you a complete streaming experience on your mobile device, anywhere and anytime.

With DigicelTV, you can choose from packages that feature sports, entertainment, kids' content, or premium programming. Enjoy live broadcasts of popular sports matches, drama series, movies, news, and more right at your fingertips.

Getting Started is Easy!

Anyone can start streaming, simply ensure you have an active DigicelTV subscription. You can purchase a subscription within the app, through MyDigicel Pacific App (MDA), or via USSD if you're a Digicel customer.

DigicelTV is open to all!

Please note that mobile network or Wi-Fi charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

Start streaming with DigicelTV now and never miss a moment!

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Stay ahead of the race and add a touch of elegance to your device with GridBox!

The FloSports app is the best way to watch your favorite sports. Stream thousands of live events per year across more than 20 different sports. Watch unlimited highlights, full replays, exclusive coverage, and original content. 

The FloSports App gives you the ability to: 

- Stream Anywhere: watch thousands of live-streaming sports events from your phone
- Personalize Your Experience: favorite the sports, teams, series, leagues, and tracks you care about most
- Stay Updated: expert news editorial, highlights, and in-depth coverage for your favorite sports
- Improved Search: quickly find event schedules, results, and rankings
- Original Content: watch original films, series, interviews, and more
- Data at Your Fingertips: access unparalleled data and statistics for both players and teams
- Watch on the Big Screen: cast live streams from your device to your TV using AirPlay

Sign up for FloSports to enjoy access to the sports across the FloSports network: Dirt Racing, Pavement Racing, Drag Racing, College Sports, Wrestling, Grappling, Hockey, Football, Basketball, Softball, Soccer, Volleyball, Cheerleading, Track, Long-Distance Running, Cross-Country Running, Marching Band, Lacrosse, Rugby, Cycling, Gymnastics, Field Hockey, Swimming, and more!

- Watch events from our partners like High Limit Racing, Lucas Oil Late Model Dirt Series, NASCAR, Chili Bowl, CARS Tour, Snowball Derby, USA Wrestling, United World Wrestling, NCAA Conferences, Beat the Streets, ADCC, IBJJF, Who’s Number One, AHL, ECHL, USHL, Varsity, UCA, UDA, NCA, Cheerleading & Dance Worlds, Wanda Diamond League, Penn Relays, AAU, DCI, WGI, Tour de France, UCI, La Vuelta, USA Rugby, Rugby Europe, SANZAAR, PGF, and many other top-tier leagues and organizations.


- A FloSports subscription grants you access to the FloSports network, which includes FloRacing, FloWrestling, FloCollege, FloHockey, FloCheer, Varsity.TV, FloGrappling, FloTrack, MileSplit, FloMarching, FloRugby, FloBikes, FloFootball, FloHoops, FloBaseball, FloSoftball, FloFC, FloVolleyball, FloLive, FloGymnastics, and FloSwimming.

Ten Sports is a Pakistani sports television channel. It was launched in 2002 and has since become the most popular sports channel in Pakistan. The channel is dedicated to broadcasting a wide range of sports events, including cricket, football, hockey, tennis, and other popular sports.

Ten Sports has the exclusive broadcasting rights for major sports events such as the Pakistan Super League (PSL), International Cricket Council (ICC) events, Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) events, and various domestic and international sports leagues.
Ten Sports channel also features various sports analysis programs, expert opinions, and talk shows to keep its viewers up-to-date with the latest sports news and happenings. Ten Sports broadcasts live cricket tv 24 hours a day, and its programs can be accessed through cable and satellite networks across Pakistan and some other countries.

Not just live scores, this app also provides live match toss and playing 11 updates, news updates and you will also be able to check upcoming Cricket matches schedule, browse upcoming Cricket series of team India, and all the other International Cricket teams and T20 leagues schedules.

I hope you like our efforts and this app is add value in your mobile apps collection & you no need to another app for sports because this app is the one solution app of sports entertainment.

Thanks

ICC.tv is the new official home of ICC cricket video.

Watch cricket LIVE and on-demand in select regions. It is FREE to Sign Up to ICC.tv and stream live matches or catch up on the action with on-demand replays and highlights.

Subscribers in select regions can also buy pay-per-view passes to watch tournaments, tours, series, an entire match or just a single day of cricket. Prices vary depending on the event and your region.

Upcoming and recent events on ICC.tv include:
* Australia tour of Pakistan: three Tests, three ODIs, one T20I
* The Ashes: Australia v England men’s and women’s series
* India tour of South Africa: three Tests and three ODIs
* Pakistan Super League: every match live and on-demand
* ICC World Test Championship Final: India v New Zealand
* ICC Men’s T20 World Cup
* ICC U19 Men’s Cricket World Cup
* ICC Women’s Cricket World Cup

Live and on-demand videos are available on ICC.tv in most countries across Europe, the Middle East, south-east Asia, central Asia, the Pacific and South America. Restrictions apply in select regions. Find out the events available in your region at: www.ICC.tv

Download the ICC.tv app now to watch live ball-by-ball action.

For more information on ICC.tv go to: https://www.icc-cricket.com/ICCtv/faqs

For terms of use go to: https://www.icc-cricket.com/about/the-icc/legal-notices/website-terms-of-use

Cricket Australia Live is your No.1 destination for live cricket scores, match coverage, breaking news, video highlights and in-depth feature stories.

Features:

Easy Tournament is a website and app to organize championships, leagues and tournaments. Post the results, leaderboard, photos, videos and news so that everyone can follow your championship.

With the app you also have rankings of players, you can create polls and votes, attach documents, print scoresheets and tables, share images of the results, open for registrations and many other features.

SPORT AND MODALITIES
Manage tournaments of different sports and eSports

SOCCER
FUTSAL
HANDBALL
BASKETBALL
VOLLEYBALL
TENNIS
TABLE TENNIS (PING PONG)
MOBA (LOL, DOTA)
BATTLE ROYALE (FORTNITE, FREE FIRE, CALL OF DUTY)
SHOOT GAMES
ONLINE FOOTBALL (PES, FIFA)
And several other options for you to create the tournament you want.

TYPES OF CHAMPIONSHIPS
You can easily create round-robin tournaments , knockouts, groups, or a combination of whatever you want. It is also possible to create championships with several categories, great for school games or championships with age divisions or separated by male / female.

COMPLETE SYSTEM
With the app you can add moderators to help you edit the championship, send team registration links, add sponsor banners, team logos and player photos, share on social networks and much more.

If you have any questions please contact us the way you prefer and we will help you as soon as possible.

Download now and start using the best tournament manager.

- Sets, for sports like tennis and volleyball
 - Cup, organize playoff/knockout/cup tournaments
 - Rating calculator. Calculate new ratings for all the tournament participants.
 - Scores. Finally, you are able to add scores to matches, so you can organise sports tournaments as well
 - Manage players. Now you can easily edit players after they have been created
 - Manage all your tournaments in one app
 - Add and remove players to your player database, where you can easily choose players for each tournament
 - Generate a tournament schedule automatically, including Bye rounds in case you have an odd number of players
 - View results in a tournament grid or sorted by current standings
 - Share the tournament schedule, table or final results with all the players 


Tournament Manager Pro version of the app is available as a one-time purchase or as a monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscription.

Subscription terms:
- The subscription auto-renews at the end of each term.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

Privacy policy and Terms of Use: https://oval.fi/privacy-round-robin/

Race Widgets is a beautiful and comprehensive real-time race statistics app built for Forumla 1 fans. Simple enough to pick up and use immediately, yet powerful enough to stay ahead of the curve.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE RACE WIDGETS:

Get all the latest stats and info from races, qualifying sessions, sprints, and practice sessions in real-time. View lap-by-lap data, listen in to driver radio messages and race control messages, and more.

NOTABLE FEATURES:

- View the season’s races on a globe, and the paths between them
- View tracks overlayed on the globe
- Comprehensive race results

OTHER EXCITING FEATURES:

- Driver of the day
- Fastest laps
- Race breakdowns for laps, pit stops, and more
- Driver and team standings
- Driver and team predictions
- Race control messages and flags
- Listen in to driver radio messages
- Extensive track details
- Latest weather overviews
- Entire weekend structure
- Driver and team history and stats
- Race reminders via Calendar
- Race reminders via push notifications
- Share various stats as images
- Accessibility labels, dynamic font sizing, and VoiceOver support

---

Access to some of the app’s PRO features requires a monthly/yearly subscription, or a one-off purchase.

Your Race Widgets subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > Subscriptions to manage your membership and turn auto-renew off. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

VisualEyes is the ultimate coaching and video analysis tool for athletes, coaches, and trainers. With features like frame-by-frame scrubbing, video comparison, and drawing tools, you can easily analyze your technique and make improvements. Whether you're a coach looking to help your athletes succeed or an athlete looking to improve your skills, VisualEyes has the tools you need.

Useful for any sport with highly technical aspects, Baseball, Softball, Football, Tennis, Track & Field, Bowling, Hockey, Figure Skating, Dance, Soccer, Basketball, Wrestling, Lacrosse & many more.

Use the app to record high-speed videos in up to 4K resolution and any frame rate supported by your device. With frame-by-frame scrubbing, you can analyze every aspect of your performance in detail. The app's drawing tools allow you to demonstrate and highlight specific areas of focus, and you can organize your videos by athlete and/or tags for easy reference.

VisualEyes also includes a slow-motion feature that lets you watch your videos back at fractions of their original speed. You can zoom in and move videos around on the screen for a closer look, and compare videos side-by-side or overlayed to show progress and compare technique to professional athletes. The app even lets you record coaching voiceovers to provide additional guidance and feedback. When you're ready to share your videos, you can export them from the app with the push of a button.
